front.title: ALTO/H2: The ALTO Protocol using HTTP/2

abstract.t: The ALTO base protocol [RFC7285] uses HTTP/1.x as the transport protocol and hence ALTO transport includes the limitations of HTTP/1.x. ALTO/SSE [RFC8895] addresses some of the limitations, but is still based on HTTP/1.x. This document introduces ALTO new transport, which provides the transport functions of ALTO/SSE on top of HTTP/2, for more efficient ALTO transport.
